structure.unit: GENERAL PROVISIONS AS TO OFFICES AND OFFICERS -- SOCIAL SECURITY FOR PUBLIC EMPLOYEES -- EMPLOYEES RETIREMENT SYSTEM

law.text: Any person who is an employee on the date his department first participates in the system, either in service or on leave from service, who does not elect within the time set forth in KRS 61.525 to become a member and thereby make contributions required of him by KRS 61.510 to 61.705, shall forfeit all right for credit for service with any department prior to the date he might subsequently elect to become a member, except as provided in KRS 61.552.
law.history: Amended 1988 Ky. Acts ch. 349, sec. 10, effective July 15, 1988. -- Amended 1976 Ky. Acts ch. 321, sec. 40. -- Amended 1962 Ky. Acts ch. 58, sec. 3. -- Amended 1956 Ky. Acts ch. 110, sec. 5.
